verses.verse: Do not be envious <S%H7065><s%> of evil <S%H9567><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> Nor <S%H408><s%> desire <S%H183><s%> to be with them;
For their minds <S%H3820><s%> devise <S%H1897><s%> violence, <S%H7701><s%> And their lips <S%H8193><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> of trouble. <S%H5999><s%>
By wisdom <S%H2451><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> is built, <S%H1129><s%> And by understanding <S%H8394><s%> it is established; <S%H3559><s%>
And by knowledge <S%H1847><s%> the rooms <S%H2315><s%> are filled <S%H4390><s%> With all <S%H3605><s%> precious <S%H3368><s%> and pleasant <S%H5273><s%> riches. <S%H1952><s%>
A wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> is strong, <S%H5797><s%> And a man <S%H376><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%> increases <S%H553><s%> power. <S%H3581><s%>
For by wise <S%H8458><s%> guidance <S%H8458><s%> you will wage <S%H6213><s%> war, <S%H4421><s%> And in abundance <S%H7230><s%> of counselors <S%H3289><s%> there is victory. <S%H8668><s%>
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is too high <S%H7311><s%> for a fool, <S%H191><s%> He does not open <S%H6605><s%> his mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the gate. <S%H8179><s%>
He who plans <S%H2803><s%> to do <S%H7489><s%> evil, <S%H7489><s%> Men will call <S%H7121><s%> him a schemer. <S%H1167><s%> <S%H4209><s%>
The devising <S%H2154><s%> of folly <S%H200><s%> is sin, <S%H9128><s%> And the scoffer <S%H9238><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to men. <S%H120><s%>
If you are slack <S%H7503><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of distress, <S%H6869><s%> Your strength <S%H3581><s%> is limited. <S%H9495><s%>

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> those who are being taken <S%H3947><s%> away to death, <S%H4194><s%> And those who are staggering <S%H4131><s%> to slaughter, <S%H2027><s%> O <S%H518><s%> hold <S%H2820><s%> [them] back. <S%H2820><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> you say, <S%H559><s%> "See, <S%H2005><s%> we did not know <S%H3045><s%> this, <S%H2088><s%>" Does He not consider <S%H995><s%> [it] who weighs <S%H8505><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%>? And does He not know <S%H3045><s%> [it] who keeps <S%H5341><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%>? And will He not render <S%H7725><s%> to man <S%H120><s%> according to his work <S%H6467><s%>?
My son, <S%H1121><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> honey, <S%H1706><s%> for it is good, <S%H2896><s%> Yes, the honey <S%H5317><s%> from the comb <S%H5317><s%> is sweet <S%H4966><s%> to your taste; <S%H2441><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> [that] wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is thus <S%H3651><s%> for your soul; <S%H5315><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you find <S%H4672><s%> [it,] then there <S%H3426><s%> will be a future, <S%H319><s%> And your hope <S%H8615><s%> will not be cut <S%H3772><s%> off. <S%H3772><s%>

Do not lie <S%H693><s%> in wait, <S%H693><s%> O wicked <S%H7563><s%> man, <S%H7563><s%> against the dwelling <S%H5116><s%> of the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> Do not destroy <S%H7703><s%> his resting <S%H7258><s%> place; <S%H7258><s%>

For a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H6662><s%> falls <S%H5307><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times, <S%H7651><s%> and rises <S%H6965><s%> again, But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> stumble <S%H3782><s%> in [time of] calamity. <S%H9567><s%>
Do not rejoice <S%H8055><s%> when your enemy <S%H340><s%> falls, <S%H5307><s%> And do not let your heart <S%H3820><s%> be glad <S%H1523><s%> when he stumbles; <S%H3782><s%>
Lest <S%H6435><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> [it] and be displeased, <S%H7489><s%> <S%H5869><s%> And He turn <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> His anger <S%H639><s%> from him.
Do not fret <S%H2734><s%> because of evildoers, <S%H7489><s%> Or be envious <S%H7065><s%> of the wicked; <S%H7563><s%>
For there will be no <S%H3808><s%> future <S%H319><s%> for the evil <S%H7451><s%> man; <S%H7451><s%> The lamp <S%H5216><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will be put <S%H1846><s%> out.
My son, <S%H1121><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and the king; <S%H4428><s%> Do not associate <S%H6148><s%> with those who are given <S%H8132><s%> to change; <S%H8132><s%>
For their calamity <S%H343><s%> will rise <S%H6965><s%> suddenly, <S%H6597><s%> And who <S%H4310><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> the ruin <S%H6365><s%> [that comes] from both <S%H8147><s%> of them?
These <S%H428><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> are sayings of the wise. <S%H2450><s%> To show <S%H5234><s%> partiality <S%H5234><s%> <S%H6440><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%> is not good. <S%H2896><s%>
He who says <S%H559><s%> to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> "You are righteous, <S%H6662><s%>" Peoples <S%H5971><s%> will curse <S%H6895><s%> him, nations <S%H3816><s%> will abhor <S%H2194><s%> him;
But to those who rebuke <S%H3198><s%> the [wicked] will be delight, <S%H5276><s%> And a good <S%H9185><s%> blessing <S%H1293><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> upon them.
He kisses <S%H5401><s%> the lips <S%H8193><s%> Who gives <S%H7725><s%> a right <S%H5228><s%> answer. <S%H1697><s%>

Prepare <S%H3559><s%> your work <S%H4399><s%> outside, <S%H2351><s%> And make <S%H6257><s%> it ready <S%H6257><s%> for yourself in the field; <S%H7704><s%> Afterwards, <S%H310><s%> then, build <S%H1129><s%> your house. <S%H1004><s%>
Do not be a witness <S%H5707><s%> against your neighbor <S%H7453><s%> without <S%H2600><s%> cause, <S%H2600><s%> And do not deceive <S%H6601><s%> with your lips. <S%H8193><s%>

Do <S%H6213><s%> not say, <S%H559><s%> "Thus <S%H3651><s%> I shall do <S%H6213><s%> to him as he has done <S%H6213><s%> to me; I will render <S%H7725><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> according to his work. <S%H6467><s%>"
I passed <S%H5674><s%> by the field <S%H7704><s%> of the sluggard, <S%H6102><s%> And by the vineyard <S%H3754><s%> of the man <S%H120><s%> lacking <S%H2638><s%> sense; <S%H3820><s%>

And behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was completely <S%H3605><s%> overgrown <S%H5927><s%> with thistles, <S%H7057><s%> Its surface <S%H6440><s%> was covered <S%H3680><s%> with nettles, <S%H2738><s%> And its stone <S%H68><s%> wall <S%H1447><s%> was broken <S%H2040><s%> down. <S%H2040><s%>
When I saw, <S%H2372><s%> I reflected <S%H7896><s%> <S%H3820><s%> upon it; I looked, <S%H7200><s%> [and] received <S%H3947><s%> instruction. <S%H4148><s%>
"A little <S%H4592><s%> sleep, <S%H8142><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> slumber, <S%H8572><s%> A little <S%H4592><s%> folding <S%H2264><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> to rest, <S%H7901><s%>"
Then your poverty <S%H7389><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> [as] a robber, <S%H1980><s%> And your want <S%H4270><s%> like an armed <S%H4043><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>
